articles.description: HOLIDAYS have been a bit of a shambles this year due to the covid pandemic but there are hopes the landscape of travel will be better next year. For many, UK holidays will be the best option as rules continue to chop and change abroad - but how is best to boo…
articles.content:
Express.co.uk spoke to Matt Fox, CEO at the last-minute UK holiday provider Snaptrip for his travel advice.

articles.title: Molly-Mae Hague says she's a 'happy girl' in new radiant snap from her idyllic Maldives getaway - Daily Mail

articles.content:
